component.name: PhotoFlare
component.summary: Simple but powerful Cross Platform Image Editor

description.p: This is an effort to bring quick, simple but powerful image editing to the masses. PhotoFlare is inspired by the image editor currently only available on Microsoft Windows â€“ PhotoFiltre. However, it will not be a straight clone. It is being built from the ground up to be much improved and cross platform too!

ul.li: Batch processing tool with support for all editor features.
Fixed user only able to set Pixels as default unit via preferences.
Fixed copy not taking selected area instead of full image.
Fixed scaled corners not being clickable.
Fixed imageRatio not being set correctly.
Fixed gamma data type for batch processing.
Added feature to detect and change invalid file extensions.
Improved selection lines to depend on scale.
Fixed the TextTool wrapping for text more than a single line.
Fixed the EraserTool incorrectly showing zero as the initial radius.
Fixed issue with the language path not detected correctly.
